newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Sept 4.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Sept 4.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- New projects in Jubail industrial city are worth 588 million riyals.
- Arab Petroleum Investments Corp raises capital by $60 million to $460 million.
- Saudi and Egyptian officials to meet on September 16 to set agenda for talks by joint economic commission.
- Investment by expatriates in National Commercial Bank- managed funds increased 20 percent.
- Commerce minister meets Chinese trade delegation to discuss boosting commercial cooperation and joint projects.
